title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set.
description: When using a table report item without setting the data set, the group dialog should still be accessible.
OB: An error is displayed when attempting to use the group dialog without setting the data set.
EB: As part of the template requirements, we expect the UI to allow access to the group dialog even when the data set is not set.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a table report item to the template.
2. Do not set the data set for the table.
3. Try to create a new table group, and observe that the group dialog does not appear as expected.
